pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Glued Gel 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

It's got to be got2b!
Wind-tunnel tested! This got2b water resistant spiking glue delivers hold so strong your style will last until your next shampoo. Push through hair to put it in place. Nothing´s moving here!

It's got to be got2b!
Wind-tunnel tested! This got2b water resistant spiking glue delivers hold so strong your style will last until your next shampoo. Push through hair to put it in place. Nothing´s moving here!

Use on damp hair. Squeeze a small amount into palms, rub hands together and distribute evenly throughout hair. For over the top spikes, apply to fingertips and pull through hair twisting at the tips.
Cool tip for extra grip: Slightly dampen tips of spikes and reapply a small amount of glued spiking glue. Keep your spikes super stiff!

From volume & shine to hold & spikes, got2b offers the right styling products for your individual look. It's all about expressing your style - show off your personality, individuality & attitude with got2b brand! No matter what look you're going for, you can get it with got2b products. You got2b you!

Made in Australia.

Tube & Cap can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details. Push Your Styling to New Heights

Suitable For: all hair types

Size: 150mL

Hair Type: all hair types

KEY FEATURES

• For hairstyle that will last until your next shampoo
• Spiking glue
• Ultimate hold 6
• Water resistant
• You got2b you!

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes

FLAMMABLE WARNING

Yes

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Alcohol denat., VP/VA Copolymer, PVP, Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/
Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Propylene Glycol, Triacontanyl PVP, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-21, Sodium Benzoate, Corn Starch Modified, Parfum, PEG-8 Beeswax, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laurtrimonium Chloride, Benzalkonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene

Active Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Alcohol denat., VP/VA Copolymer, PVP, Vinyl Caprolactam/VP/
Dimethylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Propylene Glycol, Triacontanyl PVP, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-21, Sodium Benzoate, Corn Starch Modified, Parfum, PEG-8 Beeswax, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Citric Acid, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laurtrimonium Chloride, Benzalkonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene

Directions

Use on damp hair. Squeeze a small amount into palms, rub hands together and distribute evenly throughout hair. For over the top spikes, apply to fingertips and pull through hair twisting at the tips.
For extra grip: Slightly dampen tips of spikes and reapply a small amount of glued spiking glue. Keep your spikes super stiff!

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
